snippet: Can you make out what Paula Gamache is trying to say to us?
abstract: Can you make out what Paula Gamache is trying to say to us?
lead_paragraph: MONDAY'S PUZZLE - You can't tell from my head shot, but I wear glasses. Even so, it was a strain to make out exactly what Paula Gamache was trying to get across to us, because no matter how hard I peered OVER, AROUND, BEYOND and UNDER, her message went SIGHT UNSEEN.
